modName: Blades Tomb Hideout And Home For You
summary: Blades base, and player home in an old tomb.
descriptionHtml:
--V 1.1--
Cosmetic polishing mostly

--Version: 1.0--
Adding several room
Adding several new Blades oriented NCPs, including vendors
Added a usable player room so the whole project works as a home

   This adds a tomb used by the Blades as an outpost. It is just south of Markath. See screenshots. This is a functional WIP since i\'m still pretty new at the CK. Feedback and ideas on how to proceed is welcome. This also has the ability to function as a player home if desired. It has all forging tools, crafting, alchemy and enchantment table, cooking. Has mannequins and trophy mounts. Also has several vendors for all your buying/ selling needs. And its fully navmeshed for all followers.
   Only conflict should be if someone else edited the same worldspace as me. Should be pretty slim i would think as its pretty off the beaten path.

Plans:
key for entrance
more rooms, ideas?
more ncps
quest? maybe...
author: hazarkath
